content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal mine at position (x)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)

### Iron plate factory at position (x)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z) and inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z)

### Error Tips

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting Iron Gear Wheel requires iron-plate, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. 

### Errors when trying to inspect or update inventories of entities that are empty
- Check the inventory of the entity before attempting to inspect or update it to avoid unnecessary errors.
